summary: At Level 4, Malaysia’s Digital Nasional Berhad's 5G-Advanced network uses AI-based predictive analytics to anticipate issues and self-adjust for optimal performance.

summary: The FCC wants to axe broadband label rules that provide “minimal benefit” to consumers – while missing the point of the labels in the first place.

summary: EchoStar is selling its unpaired AWS-3 spectrum to SpaceX in exchange for about $2.6 billion in SpaceX stock.

summary: Nokia kicked off the Brooklyn 6G Summit showing off radio research for the new cellular standard.

title: AI standards, IP, cybersecurity at risk as US government shutdown drags on
summary: AI standards, cybersecurity frameworks and tech policy is paused at NIST. U.S. Copyright Office is closed but accepting filings for date-of-receipt purposes.

title: Here's the skinny on T-Mobile's latest satellite-powered offer
summary: Anyone with a compatible phone – including customers of Verizon and AT&T – can sign up to use T-Mobile Text to 911 via satellite.

title: NTIA unveils yet another new requirement for BEAD money
summary: Providers must agree “in writing” to not take additional federal subsidies for BEAD projects, said NTIA chief Arielle Roth. Here’s what that means.

title: MobileX offers free wireless service for SNAP customers
summary: MobileX CEO Peter Adderton is challenging carrier CEOs in the wireless industry to step up and help people who are losing federal food assistance due to the lapse in the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits.

title: Opinion: Welcome to the secret society of satellite spectrum
summary: A top satellite spectrum expert said, "We almost think of ourselves as some kind of secret society or something, because so few people can wrap their heads around it."

title: Cisco pitches Unified Edge to power telco managed services
summary: Cisco’s new Unified Edge platform consolidates compute, networking, storage, and security into a remotely managed chassis to enable telcos to scale AI-as-a-Service and simplify enterprise edge AI deployments.

title: Zayo looks to Nokia for its big IP network overhaul
summary: Zayo will use Nokia’s IP routing tech to revamp its network architecture and bring end-devices closer to customers, said Zayo SVP Aaron Werley.

title: The tipping point for two-phase cooling is here
summary: Single-phase direct-to-chip systems currently dominate the liquid cooling landscape. But that could soon change, Accelsius’ CEO says.

title: Eaton will acquire Boyd Thermal for $9.5B
summary: The power management company signed a deal with Goldman Sachs Asset Management to acquire Boyd Thermal for 22.5-times its expected 2026 EBITDA.

title: IQ Fiber expands its service area with all-fiber internet service in Charleston, SC
summary: The Jacksonville, Florida-based ISP announced it has launched a 100% fiber-optic internet service in Charleston, S.C., and its surrounding communities.
